channel.title: I broke my leg while rollerblading</3
channel.description:
when I went up a slanted ramp. A dude on the bike came down at hit me and I blacked out for about 5 seconds and then sat up a bit and Felix (my bestfriend) was screaming at me asking if I were okay and I put my thumb up cause it didn't feel like I was hurt until I turned my leg over and it was blood everywhere then I told him that my leg was bleeding so the dude that hit me rushed over to me and ripped his shirt off and put pressure on my leg and carried me to the picnic table that people grind and layed me down, at that time Felix was trying to call his sister to come get me but then a boy named garret got dropped off and his mom told his dad that maybe that boy was hurt so they turned around and went back to the skatepark and called 911. And finally the ambulance came and got me. And before they did the dude that hit me went over to where we feel and picked up two pieces of his medal peddle that I broke with my leg But when I broke my bone, it went over then went in the same exact spot. But I got a cast from my toes to my thigh now. And I gotta walk with cruches and I went back to the skatepark today to see where I fell and they was just a little blood cause they cleaned it up, I kept my pants though, they had to cut them off of me and they have lots of blood on them. >. <
Here it is....
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u642/ictbguud123/Meinacast_zpsd4b370bf.jpg[/img]

item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

longboarding
steep hill
car drives by, no lane room
can’t maintain control
wipeout
feel ok
ambulance shows up
imfinewtfyoudoing.jpg
no concussion
still need to disinfect arms
put on heavy drugs
arm scrubbed
I’m so fucking high
recover in a week

Sucks for you bro.
